metadata.title: CVE-2013-6825 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: (1) movescu.cc and (2) storescp.cc in dcmnet/apps/, (3)dcmnet/libsrc/scp.cc, (4) dcmwlm/libsrc/wlmactmg.cc, (5) dcmprscp.cc and(6) dcmpsrcv.cc in dcmpstat/apps/, (7) dcmpstat/tests/msgserv.cc, and (8)dcmqrdb/apps/dcmqrscp.cc in DCMTK 3.6.1 and earlier does not check thereturn value of the setuid system call, which allows local users to gainprivileges by creating a large number of processes.

criterions.comment: dcmtk package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
